cards.content:
This theme was made by tokems (Blog) and is being hosted by cj81499 (Contact).

The icon theme is from tokems' website, the control center is from hoenir's repo, and the theme was updated to work with iOS 8+ by cj81499.

A wallpaper for iPhone 5 or iPhone 6 is available at"Library/Themes/Glyphs - iOS 8.theme/Wallpaper".

Contains a Polus compatible CC theme.

Version 1.27 (4/15/2017)

Wallpaper


Version 1.26 (9/2/2016)

Update Hide Icon Labels


Version 1.25 (8/22/2016)

Dependency changes. Should default to Anemone instead of Winterboard now.


Version 1.24 (6/17/2016)

Fix .DS_Store issue(?)


Version 1.23 (6/17/2016)

Added Hide Icon Labels (Anemone Only)


Version 1.22 (3/17/2016)

Updated iCleaner Pro


Version 1.21 (2/23/2016)

Fixed some compatibility issues with older iOS versions


Version 1.20 (1/31/2016)

Changed Clock


Version 1.19 (1/9/2016)

Respring Logo is now it's own theme

Size Optimizations (I forgot to optimize black version last time)


Version 1.18 (12/26/2015)

Added Black Version (I haven't tested this much. Please report any issues.)


Version 1.17 (12/19/2015)

Tweetbot 4 Icon


Version 1.16 (12/1/2015)

Allow installation on any iOS version

Please report bugs


Version 1.15 (11/17/2015)

Winterboard Clock Fix


Version 1.14 (11/1/2015)

Size Optimizations


Version 1.13 (10/31/15)

Activator Fix (Anemone only. Winterboard can't theme Activator)


Version 1.12 (10/29/15)

I'm not quite sure, but I know I changed something.


Version 1.11 (10/27/15)

New Depiction

Added Polus CC Theme


Version 1.10 (10/6/15)

Fix Respring Logo for White Devices


Version 1.9 (9/28/15)

Depiction update

Winterboard Clock fixes (Requires Custom Clock Icon)

I Forgot to Make a Changlog

Probably Mostly Icon Fixes

*Shrugs*

Winterboard Support

Icon and Badge Fixes

Version 1.1 (8/20/15)

Icon Fixes


Version 1.0 (8/19/15)
